tools.name: ExpressEmotion
tools.description: Set the eye mood color while blink continues automatically.

mood.description: Emotion to express: neutral | annoyed | angry

tools.name: PlayLEDPattern
tools.description:
Play a LED pattern with mathematical expressions (temporary - not saved). Use this to test patterns or create one-time effects. Variables: theta (0~2π), t (time in seconds), i (LED index 0~11). and InPort variables: var_a, var_b, var_c. Functions: sin, cos, tan, abs, sqrt, floor, ceil, max(a,b), min(a,b), mod(a,b), pow(a,b). Operators: +, -, *, /, %, <, >, <=, >=, ==, !=, &&, ||, !. Examples:
- Rotating rainbow: hue='theta+t', sat='1', brightness='0.5'
- Half split (red/cyan): hue='(i < 6) * 0 + (i >= 6) * 3.14', sat='1', brightness='0.5'
- Even LEDs only: brightness='(i % 2 == 0) * 1.0'
- Pulsing: brightness='sin(t*2)*0.5+0.5'
- Complex: hue='(i >= 3 && i <= 8) * (theta + t)', sat='1', brightness='0.8'

tools.name: StopLEDPattern
tools.description: Stop the currently playing LED pattern and return to eye blink mode.
